---
title: "Computing access"
---

To access computing resources for CIVE 461/861:

1.  Create a [Github account](https://github.com/).

2.  Request access to the [CIVE461/861 Github repo](https://github.com/UNL-Hawkins-Lab/CIVE_461)

3.  Create a VS codespace instance by clicking the green Code button on the CIVE_461 repo.

Additional instructions are provided in a README on the repo page.
